name: express-manifold
description: Serve multiple websites / webapps for different domains from a single server.

scripts.generate-example-certificate: mkdir -p path && mkdir -p path/to && openssl req -x509 -out path/to/certificate.crt -keyout path/to/key.key -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -sha256 -subj '/CN=localhost'

author: drinking-code
